resources.string:
This program transmits sound recorded from microphone to some other devices running the same program, so works like Walkie Talkie radio.

 Devices find each other by NSD (aka Bonjour).

 Program released under GPL license, source code available at https://github.com/js-labs/WalkieTalkie

 Application use JS-Collider (scalable Java NIO framework), see https://github.com/js-labs/js-collider for further details.
